verbs.description: [ARG0: Some Korean Americans] [V: said] [ARG1: they were hopeful ahead of the scheduled June 12 summit between Kim Jong Un and Donald Trump] .
Some Korean Americans said [ARG1: they] [V: were] [ARG2: hopeful] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of the scheduled June 12 summit between Kim Jong Un and Donald Trump] .
Some Korean Americans said they were hopeful ahead of the [V: scheduled] [ARG1: June 12 summit] between Kim Jong Un and Donald Trump .
